markdownRemark.html: As many of you have been reading, Macromedia released an update to ColdFusion MX 7. You can download the updater for version 7.0.1 from macromedia's website. What got me exited was Macromedia finally has a Mac OS X installer for ColdFusion MX 7.0.1.

frontmatter.title: ColdFusion MX 7 now has Mac OS X installer
